subject: Perl6::Perldoc v0.0.4 just uploaded to CPAN
body:
Thanks to everyone who sent feedback and bug reports.

Major improvements in this release:

     - Fixed bleadperl support for on-the-fly carping and croaking
       (thanks Aevar)

     - Added filtering kludge for Windows-style newlines
       (thanks Thom)

     - Changed "missing =itemN" diagnostic from an error to a warning,
       since it's still possible to infer the list nestedness required,
       which the parser now does

     - Added Filter::Simple dependency to Makefile.PL and Build.pl
       (thanks Dave)

     - Added support for new P formatting code
       for generating and inserting tables-of-contents

     - Vastly improved robustness of XHTML translation

     - Added option to allow XHTML translator to build complete documents
      (thanks Nick)


Damian
